title: Constructionary
notes: SteamDB lists VR Only, Shared/Split Screen PvP/Co-op, and 3 user reviews. Play mode inferred from description.
raw_comment: Similar to pictionary. 1 VR player is given a word and tries to create a model representing that word. An audience of any number can watch the screen and guess the word. 1 VR headset + 1 screen.
